widgets.name: PbrGgxDeformMaterial
widgets.description: A PBR GGX material than can be deformed, see u_deformation.

properties.name: u_deformation
properties.description: A custom shader constant to control the amount of deformation. Positive and negative float values are valid, 0.0 does not cause any deformation.

properties.name: u_emissiveMapHighlightColor
properties.description: The color of areas with extra emission as specified by the emissive strength map.

properties.name: u_emissiveMapColor
properties.description: The color of areas with emission as specified by the emissive map.

properties.name: u_emissiveStrengthMapStrength
properties.description: The extra strength of the emission in areas specified by the emissive strength map.

properties.name: u_emissiveStrengthMap
properties.description:
The grayscale emissive strength map that specifies which regions of the model should have extra light emission.
Black regions in the map indicate no extra emission, white regions have full emission in the strength as specified by u_emissiveStrengthMapStrength, in the color specified by u_emissiveMapHighlightColor.

widgets.name: PbrPhongDeformMaterial
widgets.description: A PBR Phong material than can be deformed, see u_deformation.

properties.name: u_deformation
properties.description: A custom shader constant to control the amount of deformation. Positive and negative float values are valid, 0.0 does not cause any deformation.

widgets.name: PhongDeformMaterial
widgets.description: A Phong material than can be deformed, see u_deformation.

properties.name: u_deformation
properties.description: A custom shader constant to control the amount of deformation. Positive and negative float values are valid, 0.0 does not cause any deformation.

widgets.name: PbrGgxGlassMaterial
widgets.description: A glass shader, based on the PBR GGX shader implementation.

properties.name: u_baseTransparency
properties.description: The base transparency of the glass. Use values > 0.0 achieve a glass coloration effect.

properties.name: u_type
properties.description:
The type of the reflection intensity calculations.
0: no glass reflections
1: square rooted luminance as reflection intensity
2: squared luminance as reflection intensity
3: linear luminance as reflection intensity.

widgets.name: PbrGgxClearCoatGlassMaterial
widgets.description: An alternative glass shader, based on clear-coat reflections. To work correctly, it requires the clear-coat feature to be active.

properties.name: u_baseTransparency
properties.description: The base transparency of the glass. Use values > 0.0 achieve a glass coloration effect.

properties.name: u_type
properties.description:
The type of the reflection intensity calculations.
0: no glass reflections
1: square rooted luminance as reflection intensity
2: squared luminance as reflection intensity
3: linear luminance as reflection intensity.

widgets.name: PbrGgxFadeableMaterial
widgets.description: A PBR GGX material that allows for controlling the transparency while also having an Opaque texture widget feature.

properties.name: u_globalTransparency
properties.description: Controls the transparency, 0.0 for full transparency, 1.0 means fully opaque.

widgets.name: PbrPhongFadeableMaterial
widgets.description: A PBR Phong material that allows for controlling the transparency while also having an Opaque texture widget feature.

properties.name: u_globalTransparency
properties.description: Controls the transparency, 0.0 for full transparency, 1.0 means fully opaque.

widgets.name: PhongFadeableMaterial
widgets.description: A Phong material that allows for controlling the transparency while also having an OpaqueTexture widget feature.

properties.name: u_globalTransparency
properties.description: Controls the transparency, 0.0 for full transparency, 1.0 means fully opaque.
